alert.note: Alert for Coastal Duval; Coastal Nassau (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 15 at 2:44PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT EAST CENTRAL NASSAU AND NORTHEASTERN DUVAL COUNTIES THROUGH 315 PM EDT... At 244 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Talbot Island, or 9 miles south of Fernandina Beach, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Fernandina Beach, Amelia City, Little Talbot Island, and Talbot Island. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
